Alert: N = No
 
 If you recorded “No”, offer pain 
relief according to the woman’s 
preferences, availability of pain 
relief and provider’s experience. 
 You can offer an epidural at the 
lowest effective concentration 
of local anaesthetic to avoid 
complications, or opioids 
such as fentanyl, diamorphine 
and pethidine. Relaxation
